title: LP system so broke
body:
I play a game as Wukong and go 11/0/7 and we end the game after about 25 minutes and gain 15 lp. After this game i play support as thresh and my ADC is afk from lvl 1 and i start to build adc and go 13/10/13 and we lose after 50 odd minutes. I lose 21 lp. WTF, that is just dumb and they need to fix the retarted LP system.

Games are in recent match history

replies.body: it isn't based on kda. It is based on MMR which is largely influenced by your win/loss ratio. Your win/loss ratio is at 42%, meaning your MMR is ♥♥♥♥ and you have to improve this ratio before you can enjoy larger LP gains.

It is all within the MMR my friend.

Duoing tends to have that effect.
